attributes.action: Quit his Job as Prime Minister and let someone who knows what they are doing run our country!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown and Tony Blair have caused more trouble than ever by being Prime Minister, Step Down Gordon and let someone who knows what they are doing have a go!! My 2 year old cousin could run the country better than you.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
